overview: Chisato Moritaka Live 2020 (森高千里ライブ2020, Moritaka Chisato Raibu 2020) is an upcoming live video by Japanese singer/songwriter Chisato Moritaka, scheduled for release on July 28, 2021 by zetima. It is a compilation of three online concerts she hosted after her Kono Machi Tour 2020 was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic.[1][2]
title: Chisato Moritaka Live 2020
